text: Nombe nao soni achina Adi ni achina Samuda (twajonasile), soni pamasile pakuonechele kukwenu (konasika kwao) kuumila m’malo mwao muŵatamaga (mwamusyuchile kuŵa m’masame). Soni shetani ni jwasalalichisye ŵanganyao itendo yao (yangalumbana), basi ni jwasiŵilile ŵanganyao kwitala (lyagoloka) namuno kuti ŵaliji ŵakulolechesya (pakutenda ichindu)
